string.text: Do you need something?
Yeah actually
Hey! You needed something?
Yeah now is not a good time, maybe later.
Yeah... This last period has been very though, I lost a friend recently to the Zone.
Damn that must be hard, I know we're not having the time of our life here.
I guess at least we still have each other, for now...
Hey! We can do this, alright?
Yes. You're right. Thank you for taking the time to listen, I'm starting to enjoy having you in the squad.
Miao miao
Yeah! Let's do it.
You already agreed to help me, don't you remember?
Can I talk to you for a second?
Yeah sure! What's up?
Actually never mind.
About the stuff your are bringing me...
Yes, what about it?
You can bring me anything you find, no special requests!
Can you only bring me food? If you have it to spare.
I just need drinks or cigarettes.
I'm looking for medical supplies, let me know if you find any.
I need tools, keep your eyes open for those.
I need stuff to repair my gear, care to share?
Just bring me junk, that's all I want.
I'm low on ammo, if you find some let me know.
Sure, my friend! I'll find something alright.
